body: She actually likes him, and after getting drunk they get into that sexual relationship, but in the end she thought he probably just think as her as woman to have sex. Yeah, he probably could still get her from the boyfriend, but the only thing he have is feeling he had lost his chance. "So, does this mean it's over between us?" "That took you long, Enomoto-kun".
Huh, this could really easily feed into a netorase plot.
